d1_text:
Npc1000:
ï¿½You don't understand what the hey everyone is talking about, do you?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I don't either, but I try to be patient with the customers.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½They pay high prices just for a glass of water[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½and the chance to have serious, intellectual discussions.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Actually, it's an easy business.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You want a drink?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½We only serve water, though...[HALT][END]
